long_description: An easy-to-use guide offering instruction for tying and using 19 fundamental climbing knots and 16 additional variations. Raleigh, Duane. Softcover; 89 pages; illustrations. Stackpole Books; copyright 1998. Covers joining harness to rope, rope to rope, rope to anchor, belay knots, runners, rappel stoppers, backup and ascender knots. Also covers types and grades of rope, cord and webbing, what works best with what hardware, how to tie daisy chains, aiders and harnesses and more.
short_description: An easy-to-use guide offering instruction for tying and using 19 fundamental climbing knots and 16 additional variations.
